title: Who Is Kat Timpf’s Husband? Cameron Friscia’s Job & Relationship History
description: Katherine “Kat” Timpf is a reporter, columnist, and TV presenter currently affiliated with Fox News. She serves as a regular panelist on Gutfeld! and is often featured on various other Fox News shows. As the race to the 2024 US election heats up, there is considerable interest directed toward Kat Timpf, especially her personal life […] The post Who Is Kat Timpf’s Husband? Cameron Friscia’s Job & Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Tamal Kundu
excerpt: Wondering if Kat Timpf is married? Here is everything you might want to know about Kat Timpf's husband and their relationship.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Katherine “Kat” Timpf is a reporter, columnist, and TV presenter currently affiliated with Fox News. She serves as a regular panelist on Gutfeld! and is often featured on various other Fox News shows. As the race to the 2024 US election heats up, there is considerable interest directed toward Kat Timpf, especially her personal life and her husband. So, here is everything we have learned Kat Timpf’s spouse and the life they have together. Who is Kat Timpf married to? Kat Timpf is married to Cameron Friscia. During her appearance on Bill Maher’s podcast, Club Random, Kat Timpf revealed that her husband went to a boarding school and was from a “great family.” Friscia reportedly attended Indiana University, from where he earned his Master’s degree. According to Friscia’s player profile, during his time at the US Military Academy at West Point, he was also part of the institution’s lacrosse team. What is Cameron Friscia’s job? Cameron Friscia is a US Army veteran. A former US Army Ranger, Friscia was deployed in Afghanistan as part of the 101st Airborne in 2012. At present, he reportedly works as an investment banker. (via People) While his Kat Timpf is a public figure, her husband apparently prefers to lead a more private life. His last Instagram post dates back to October 2022, where wished his wife a “Happy Birthday.” Kat Timpf and Cameron Friscia’s relationship history Kat Timpf met her husband Cameron Friscia on the dating app Raya. Initially, she was unsure about him, as he was completely different from the men she previously dated. In an interview with People, Timpf said that Friscia “seemed so clean-cut.” The popular TV presenter’s opinion of her eventual husband changed over time. In August 2022, she wrote on Instagram, “I never thought a finance bro could be so loving, giving, patient & understanding, but u prove me wrong every day.” Kat Timpf and Cameron Friscia got engaged in 2020 and exchanged wedding vows on May 1, 2021. She revealed that she was pregnant in July 2024 through an op-ed on the Fox News website. Currently, the couple is busy preparing to welcome their first child and begin a new chapter of their lives.
html:
Katherine “Kat” Timpf is a reporter, columnist, and TV presenter currently affiliated with Fox News. She serves as a regular panelist on Gutfeld! and is often featured on various other Fox News shows. As the race to the 2024 US election heats up, there is considerable interest directed toward Kat Timpf, especially her personal life and her husband.

So, here is everything we have learned Kat Timpf’s spouse and the life they have together.

Who is Kat Timpf married to?

Kat Timpf is married to Cameron Friscia.

During her appearance on Bill Maher’s podcast, Club Random, Kat Timpf revealed that her husband went to a boarding school and was from a “great family.” Friscia reportedly attended Indiana University, from where he earned his Master’s degree. According to Friscia’s player profile, during his time at the US Military Academy at West Point, he was also part of the institution’s lacrosse team.

What is Cameron Friscia’s job?

Cameron Friscia is a US Army veteran.

A former US Army Ranger, Friscia was deployed in Afghanistan as part of the 101st Airborne in 2012. At present, he reportedly works as an investment banker. (via People) While his Kat Timpf is a public figure, her husband apparently prefers to lead a more private life. His last Instagram post dates back to October 2022, where wished his wife a “Happy Birthday.”

Kat Timpf and Cameron Friscia’s relationship history

Kat Timpf met her husband Cameron Friscia on the dating app Raya. Initially, she was unsure about him, as he was completely different from the men she previously dated. In an interview with People, Timpf said that Friscia “seemed so clean-cut.”

The popular TV presenter’s opinion of her eventual husband changed over time. In August 2022, she wrote on Instagram, “I never thought a finance bro could be so loving, giving, patient & understanding, but u prove me wrong every day.”

Kat Timpf and Cameron Friscia got engaged in 2020 and exchanged wedding vows on May 1, 2021. She revealed that she was pregnant in July 2024 through an op-ed on the Fox News website. Currently, the couple is busy preparing to welcome their first child and begin a new chapter of their lives.
